questions: Tell me about a time you faced a difficult problem. How did you solve it?
Describe a situation where you had to work in a team to achieve a goal.
Can you share an example of a project where you had to meet a tight deadline?
Tell me about a time you failed at something. What did you learn from it?
Describe a time you had to learn a new skill quickly. How did you approach it?
Can you give an example of a situation where you had to handle a conflict?
Tell me about a time when you had to adapt to a major change.
Describe a situation where you took initiative without being asked.
Have you ever had to explain something complex to someone with no prior knowledge? How did you do it?
Tell me about a time you had to manage multiple tasks at once. How did you prioritize?
Describe a time when you had to persuade someone to see things your way.
Tell me about a time you made a mistake at work or school. How did you handle it?
Can you give an example of a time when you exceeded expectations on a task?
Describe a moment when you received constructive criticism. How did you react?
Tell me about a time when you had to deal with an uncooperative teammate.
Have you ever had to take responsibility for a project’s failure? What did you do next?
Describe a situation where you had to work under pressure.
Tell me about a time when you had to give a presentation or speak in front of a group.
Can you share an experience where you had to step up as a leader unexpectedly?
Describe a time when you had to adjust to a company’s new technology or process.
Tell me about a time you had to help someone else succeed.
Have you ever had to resolve a disagreement between two people? How did you do it?
Describe a moment when you had to make a quick decision with limited information.
Tell me about a time when you had to handle a demanding customer or client.
Have you ever had to learn from a failure and try again? What did you change?
Describe a time when you set a challenging goal and how you achieved it.
Tell me about a situation where you had to work with someone you didn't get along with.
Can you give an example of a time when you helped improve a process or system?
Tell me about a time when you had to manage an important responsibility outside of school or work.
Describe a time when you had to work on a project outside of your comfort zone.
